title: Fill out documentation sections with knowledge from deep-research directory
summary: Successfully transferred comprehensive knowledge from deep-research directory into appropriate documentation sections, maintaining all references and ensuring proper organization. Created 4 new research files, enhanced concepts section, expanded experiments section, and updated documentation index with comprehensive cross-references.

success_criteria.text: All deep-research content is properly integrated into relevant documentation sections
References and citations are preserved and properly formatted
Documentation structure is enhanced with comprehensive content
Content is organized logically and cross-referenced appropriately

acceptance_checks.text: Deep-research content is distributed across appropriate docs sections
All research findings are properly attributed with references
Documentation index is updated to reflect new content
Content follows established documentation standards and templates

subtasks: Analyze deep-research content and map to documentation sections

changelog.text: Task file created for filling out documentation with deep-research knowledge.
Completed review and categorization of deep-research files.
Successfully mapped research content to appropriate documentation sections.
Updated 20-research section with comprehensive findings from deep-research content.
Enhanced 10-concepts section with detailed explanations and advanced memory architectures.
Expanded 30-experiments section with performance benchmarks and failure mode analysis.
Updated documentation index and cross-references to reflect new content structure.
Verified all references and citations are properly formatted. Task completed successfully.

lessons_learned: Deep-research content provides rich, comprehensive knowledge that significantly enhances documentation quality
Proper reference preservation is crucial for maintaining academic integrity and traceability
Cross-referencing between sections creates a cohesive knowledge base that's easier to navigate
Research content naturally maps to different documentation sections based on content type and purpose
Maintaining consistent formatting and structure across multiple files requires careful attention to detail
next_steps: Consider expanding session guides to incorporate new research findings
Explore creating additional experiment templates based on new research areas
Evaluate need for additional concept explanations based on user feedback
Monitor usage patterns of new content to identify areas for further enhancement

prompts.text: Fill out the sections in the docs with knowledge from the deep-research directory. Be sure to keep the references. Start a task for this.
